comments.en:
For basic printing functionality use the Postscript PPD. For advanced functionality such as printer status and maintenance features, use the HPLIP driver (which includes HPIJS).

Drum Kit (30.000 pages),

transfer unit (60.000 pages),

4 toner cartridges (1 black, 4 color).

entry in /etc/printcap

remote|remote printer on [ip-address]:\
	:sd=[spool-directory]:\
	:rm=[ip-address]:\
	:rp=lp:\
	:bk:sh:mx#0:
[ip-address] is the ip-address of the network interface configured for the printer.
